title: can't log into the game.
body:
Keeps telling me my username/PW is wrong. 

I've tried the verify account to reset PW. Which I know inst wrong (20 years working in IT)
Yet I've received no emails. 

what to do?

replies.body:
Reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll help you regain access to your account.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
